document_data.name: Ihimbraskar Evendusk
document_data.mainbody: '''Ihimbraskar Evendusk''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|241}}, Ihimbraskar and his wife [[Duilya Evendusk]] consulted some business regarding [[Cormanthor]].{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|281-284|14}}
